notesStmt.note:
Censored by Dominico Irosolomitano, Italian censor (active 1575-1624): inscribed with his name, 1597 (folio 214v); see 61, and appendix § 62-74. Censored by Giovanni Domenico Carretto, Italian censor (active 1600-1624): inscribed with his name, 1628 (folio 214v); see 100-101, and appendix § 80-84.
Mordekhai of Camerino: sold to him in 1506 (folio 2r).
Mosheh ben Yisrael Ya῾aḳov: inscribed with his name, undated (folio 2r).
Yosef Rafael of Treviso: inscribed with his name, undated (folio 2r).
Absalom: his letter and notes in Italian on four Hebrew manuscripts including Add 14763 on four paper leaves prefixed to the beginning of the manuscript, addressed to Rev. Abate Antonio Marsand, Padua, 1827.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Perush ha-Mishnah (perek Ḥeleḳ) פרוש המשנה (פרק חלק)
Igeret teḥiyat ha-metim אגרת תחית המתים
Perush ha-milot ha-zarot shebe-Moreh nevukhim le-Ramba"m פרוש המלות הזרות שבמורה נבוכים לרמב"ם
Igeret le-ḥakhme Marsiliya אגרת אל חכמי מרסיליא
Igeret ᾿el Yehonatan ha-Kohen mi-Lunel אגרת אל יהונתן הכהן מלוניל
Mishpaṭ shiv῾ah ha-aklimim משפט שבעה האקלימים

collation.p: 26 quires: i2 (folios 2-3), ii4 (folios 4-7), iii-v10 (folios 8-37), vi10-1 (folios 38-46), vii10-1 (folios 47-55), viii-xix10 (folios 56-175), xx4 (folios 176-179), xxi2 (folios 180-181), xxii-xxiv10 (folios 182-211), xxv2 (folios 212-213), xxvi2 (folios 214-215) + folio 216. Catchwords at the end of the quires. Leaves on guards.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian semi-cursive script, unpunctuated; folios 3v-7v: Italian cursive script, unpunctuated. Shelomoh Yedidyah ben Mosheh of Rome: inscribed with his name in the colophons, Viterbo, 1272 (folios 117r, 148r, 160r).

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Philosophical Miscellany. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional Ms. 14,763.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Payne & Foss: purchased by the British Museum from them in 1844: inscribed (folio [217v]).
